mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_account (nameAccount, passWord, mail, phoneNumber, delFlg, roleFlg) VALUES (#{nameAccount}, #{passWord}, #{mail}, #{phoneNumber}, #{delFlg}, #{roleFlg});
mapper.update: UPDATE user_account SET nameAccount = #{nameAccount}, passWord = #{passWord}, = #{roleFlg}, creatDate = #{creatDate}, upDateDate = #{upDateDate} WHERE MAIL = #{mail} WHERE ID = #{id};
